title: manage your privacy settings
extract: To keep your information as secure as possible from strangers, avoid any "public" settings.Check your audience. Before posting a status, see what your potential audience will be. ... Manage your privacy settings. ... Guard your personal information. ... Manage your apps. ... Control your own timeline.
extract_html:
To keep your information as secure as possible from strangers, avoid any "public" settings.
  1. Check your audience. Before posting a status, see what your potential audience will be. ...
  2. Manage your privacy settings. ...
  3. Guard your personal information. ...
  4. Manage your apps. ...
  5. Control your own timeline.
